chunk.name: chunk
chunk.description: Split an array into chunks of a given size.

returns.description: - The chunked array.

concat.name: concat
concat.description: Create a new array concatenating array with any additional arrays and/or values.

params.name: array
params.description: - The initial array to be concatenated.

params.name: values
params.description: - The values or arrays to be concatenated to the initial array.

returns.description: - The concatenated array.

difference.name: difference
difference.description: Returns the elements of the first array that are not present in any of the other arrays.

params.name: array
params.description: - The array to compare against the others.

params.name: values
params.description: - Arrays to exclude elements from the first array.

returns.description: - The filtered array containing elements not present in the other arrays.

differenceBy.name: differenceBy
differenceBy.description:
Returns the elements of the first array that are not present in any of the other arrays,
compared by a specified property.

params.name: array
params.description: - The array to compare against the others.

params.name: values
params.description: - Arrays to exclude elements from the first array.

params.name: iteratee
params.description: - The function or property name to compare elements by.

returns.description: - The filtered array containing elements not present in the other arrays.

drop.name: drop
drop.description: Removes the specified number of elements from the beginning of an array.

params.name: n
params.description: - The number of elements to remove from the start.

returns.description: - The new array with elements removed from the beginning.

dropRight.name: dropRight
dropRight.description: Removes the specified number of elements from the end of an array.

params.name: n
params.description: - The number of elements to remove from the end.

returns.description: - The new array with elements removed from the end.

dropRightWhile.name: dropRightWhile
dropRightWhile.description: Removes elements from the end of an array that satisfy the given condition.

params.name: predicate
params.description:
- The condition to test the elements against.
- Can be an object to match the properties,
- A function to test each element,
- A string to check if the property exists,
- Or an array for matching multiple conditions.

returns.description: - The new array with elements removed from the end that meet the condition.

dropWhile.name: dropWhile
dropWhile.description: Removes elements from the beginning of an array that satisfy the given condition.

params.name: predicate
params.description:
- The condition to test the elements against.
- Can be an object to match the properties,
- A function to test each element,
- A string to check if the property exists,
- Or an array for matching multiple conditions.

returns.description: - The new array with elements removed from the beginning that meet the condition.

fill.name: fill
fill.description: Fills elements in an array with a specified value.

params.name: value
params.description: - The value to fill the array with.

params.name: start
params.description: - The start index to begin filling (inclusive).

params.name: end
params.description: - The end index to stop filling (exclusive).

returns.description: - The new array with the specified value filling the elements.

findIndex.name: findIndex
findIndex.description: Finds the index of the first element in an array that satisfies the given condition.

params.name: predicate
params.description:
- The condition to test each element against.
- Can be an object to match the properties,
- A function to test each element,
- A string to check if the property exists,
- Or an array for matching multiple conditions.

returns.description: - The index of the first element that satisfies the condition, or -1 if no match is found.

findLastIndex.name: findLastIndex
findLastIndex.description: Finds the index of the last element in an array that satisfies the given condition.

params.name: predicate
params.description:
- The condition to test each element against.
- Can be an object to match the properties,
- A function to test each element,
- A string to check if the property exists,
- Or an array for matching multiple conditions.

returns.description: - The index of the last element that satisfies the condition, or -1 if no match is found.

flatten.name: flatten
flatten.description: Flattens a nested array one level deep.

returns.description: - The new array with one level of nested arrays flattened.

flattenDeep.name: flattenDeep
flattenDeep.description: Flattens a nested array completely, recursively.

returns.description: - The new array with all nested arrays completely flattened.

flatMapDepth.name: flatMapDepth
flatMapDepth.description: Flattens a mapped array up to a specified depth.

params.name: array
params.description: - The array to be mapped and flattened.

returns.description: - The new flattened array.

fromPairs.name: fromPairs
fromPairs.description: Converts an array of key-value pairs into an object.

returns.description: - The resulting object.

every.name: every
every.description: Checks if all elements in a collection pass the predicate check.

params.name: predicate
params.description: - The function or criteria to check against.

returns.description: - Returns `true` if all elements pass the check, else `false`.

initial.name: initial
initial.description: Get all elements of an array except the last one.

returns.description: - A new array excluding the last element.

intersection.name: intersection
intersection.description: Returns a new array with the intersection of the provided arrays.

returns.description: - The array of intersecting values.

intersectionBy.name: intersectionBy
intersectionBy.description:
Creates an array of unique values that are included in all given arrays,
using a specified iteratee for comparison.

returns.description: - The new array of intersected values.

intersectionWith.name: intersectionWith
intersectionWith.description: Creates an array of unique values that are included in all given arrays, using a comparator for equality checks.

returns.description: - The new array of intersecting values.

join.name: join
join.description: Join elements of an array into a string, separated by a given separator.

params.name: separator
params.description: - The separator to use between elements.

returns.description: - The joined string.

pull.name: pull
pull.description: Removes all elements from an array that are equal to the given values.

params.name: values
params.description: - The values to remove from the array.

returns.description: - The modified array with the specified values removed.

pullAll.name: pullAll
pullAll.description: Remove all occurrences of the specified values from an array.

params.name: values
params.description: - The values to remove from the array.

returns.description: - The modified array with specified values removed.

pullAllBy.name: pullAllBy
pullAllBy.description: Removes all elements from an array that are included in a given values array, based on a specific criterion.

params.name: values
params.description: - The values to remove from the array.

params.name: iteratee
params.description: - The property or function to compare the values by.

returns.description: - The modified array.

pullAllWith.name: pullAllWith
pullAllWith.description:
Removes elements from an array that are equal to elements in a given array,
using a comparator function to determine equality.

params.name: comparator
params.description: - The function used to compare elements.

returns.description: - The modified array.

pullAt.name: pullAt
pullAt.description: Removes elements from an array corresponding to the given indexes.

params.name: array
params.description: - The array to remove elements from.

params.name: indexes
params.description: - The indexes of elements to remove.

returns.description: - The array of removed elements.

reverse.name: reverse
reverse.description: Reverse the order of elements in an array.

returns.description: - The reversed array.

slice.name: slice
slice.description: Slice an array from a start position to an end position, excluding the end itself.

params.name: start
params.description: - The start position of the slice.

params.name: end
params.description: - The end position of the slice (exclusive).

returns.description: - The sliced array.

sortedIndex.name: sortedIndex
sortedIndex.description:
Find the smallest index at which a value should be inserted into a sorted array
to maintain its sorted order using binary search.

params.name: array
params.description: - The sorted array to be searched.

params.name: value
params.description: - The value to be inserted into the array.

returns.description: - The index at which the value should be inserted.

sortedIndexBy.name: sortedIndexBy
sortedIndexBy.description:
Find the smallest index at which a value should be inserted into a sorted array
to maintain its sorted order using binary search, with an iteratee for custom comparison.

params.name: array
params.description: - The sorted array to be searched.

params.name: value
params.description: - The value to be inserted into the array.

params.name: iteratee
params.description: - The iteratee function to customize the comparison.

returns.description: - The index at which the value should be inserted.

sortedLastIndex.name: sortedLastIndex
sortedLastIndex.description:
Find the largest index at which a value should be inserted into a sorted array
to maintain its sorted order using binary search.

params.name: array
params.description: - The sorted array to be searched.

params.name: value
params.description: - The value to be inserted into the array.

returns.description: - The index at which the value should be inserted.

sortedLastIndexBy.name: sortedLastIndexBy
sortedLastIndexBy.description:
Find the largest index at which a value should be inserted into a sorted array
to maintain its sorted order using binary search, with an iteratee for custom comparison.

params.name: array
params.description: - The sorted array to be searched.

params.name: value
params.description: - The value to be inserted into the array.

params.name: iteratee
params.description: - The iteratee function to customize the comparison.

returns.description: - The index at which the value should be inserted.

sortedUniq.name: sortedUniq
sortedUniq.description: Create a sorted array of unique values, optimized for sorted arrays.

params.name: array
params.description: - The sorted array to be processed.

returns.description: - The array of unique values.

sortedUniqBy.name: sortedUniqBy
sortedUniqBy.description: Create a sorted array of unique values, optimized for sorted arrays, with an iteratee for custom comparison.

params.name: array
params.description: - The sorted array to be processed.

params.name: iteratee
params.description: - The iteratee function or property name for custom uniqueness comparison.

returns.description: - The array of unique values.

take.name: take
take.description: Create a slice of the array with the first `n` elements.

params.name: n
params.description: - The number of elements to take.

returns.description: - The sliced array.

takeRight.name: takeRight
takeRight.description: Create a slice of the array with the last `n` elements.

params.name: n
params.description: - The number of elements to take from the end.

returns.description: - The sliced array.

takeRightWhile.name: takeRightWhile
takeRightWhile.description: Create a slice of the array with the last elements, based on the predicate returning falsy.

params.name: predicate
params.description: - The function or property name for the condition.

returns.description: - The slice of elements taken.

takeWhile.name: takeWhile
takeWhile.description: Create a slice of the array with the first elements, based on the predicate returning falsy.

params.name: predicate
params.description: - The function or property name for the condition.

returns.description: - The slice of elements taken.

union.name: union
union.description: Create a new array of unique values, based on the order of elements.

returns.description: - The array of unique values.

unionBy.name: unionBy
unionBy.description: Create a new array of unique values, based on an iteratee for custom comparison.

params.name: iteratee
params.description: - The iteratee function or property name for custom uniqueness comparison.

returns.description: - The array of unique values.

unionWith.name: unionWith
unionWith.description: Create a new array of unique values, based on a comparator function for custom comparison.

returns.description: - The array of unique values.
- The current timestamp in ISO format.
- Today's date in ISO format, starting at midnight.

todayEnd.name: todayEnd
todayEnd.description: Get today's date at the end of the day.

returns.description: - Today's date in ISO format, ending at 23:59:59.

monthStart.name: monthStart
monthStart.description: Get the first day of the current month.

returns.description: - The first day of the current month in ISO format.

monthEnd.name: monthEnd
monthEnd.description: Get the last day of the current month.

returns.description: - The last day of the current month in ISO format.

yearStart.name: yearStart
yearStart.description: Get the first day of the current year.

returns.description: - The first day of the current year in ISO format.

yearEnd.name: yearEnd
yearEnd.description: Get the last day of the current year.

returns.description: - The last day of the current year in ISO format.

customStart.name: customStart
customStart.description: Get the start time of a specified date unit.

returns.description: - The start time of the specified date unit in ISO format.

customEnd.name: customEnd
customEnd.description: Get the end time of a specified date unit.

returns.description: - The end time of the specified date unit in ISO format.

formatDate.name: formatDate
formatDate.description: Format a date according to a specified format.

returns.description: - The formatted date string.

castArray.name: castArray
castArray.description: Converts a value to an array if it's not already an array.

returns.description: - The converted array.

clone.name: clone
clone.description: Creates a shallow copy of a value.

returns.description: - The shallow cloned value.

cloneDeep.name: cloneDeep
cloneDeep.description: Creates a deep copy of a value.

params.name: value
params.description: - The value to be deeply cloned.

returns.description: - The deep cloned value.

params.name: value
params.description: - The first value to be compared.

params.name: other
params.description: - The second value to be compared.

returns.description: - True if values are equal, false otherwise.

gt.name: gt
gt.description: Checks if the first value is greater than the second.

params.name: value
params.description: - The first value to be compared.

params.name: other
params.description: - The second value to be compared.

returns.description: - True if the first value is greater, false otherwise.

gte.name: gte
gte.description: Checks if the first value is greater than or equal to the second.

params.name: value
params.description: - The first value to be compared.

params.name: other
params.description: - The second value to be compared.

returns.description: - True if the first value is greater than or equal to the second, false otherwise.

isArray.name: isArray
isArray.description: Checks if the value is an array.

returns.description: - True if the value is an array, false otherwise.

isBoolean.name: isBoolean
isBoolean.description: Checks if the value is a boolean.

returns.description: - True if the value is a boolean, false otherwise.

isDate.name: isDate
isDate.description: Checks if the value is a date object.

returns.description: - True if the value is a date object, false otherwise.

isEmpty.name: isEmpty
isEmpty.description: Checks if the value is empty.

returns.description: - True if the value is empty, false otherwise.

isEqual.name: isEqual
isEqual.description: Compares two values for deep equality.

params.name: value
params.description: - The first value to be compared.

params.name: other
params.description: - The second value to be compared.

returns.description: - True if values are deeply equal, false otherwise.

isInteger.name: isInteger
isInteger.description: Checks if the value is an integer.

returns.description: - True if the value is an integer, false otherwise.

isLength.name: isLength
isLength.description: Checks if the value is a valid length.

returns.description: - True if the value is a valid length, false otherwise.

isMatch.name: isMatch
isMatch.description: Checks if a value is deeply equal to a given object.

params.name: value
params.description: - The object to compare the value with.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to compare the value with.

returns.description: - Whether the value is a match.

isNaN.name: isNaN
isNaN.description: Checks if the value is NaN.

returns.description: - Whether the value is NaN.

isNil.name: isNil
isNil.description: Checks if the value is null or undefined.

returns.description: - Whether the value is null or undefined.

isNull.name: isNull
isNull.description: Checks if the value is null.

returns.description: - Whether the value is null.

isNumber.name: isNumber
isNumber.description: Checks if the value is a number.

returns.description: - Whether the value is a number.

isObject.name: isObject
isObject.description: Checks if the value is an object.

returns.description: - Whether the value is an object.

isRegExp.name: isRegExp
isRegExp.description: Checks if the value is a regular expression.

returns.description: - Whether the value is a regular expression.

isSafeInteger.name: isSafeInteger
isSafeInteger.description: Checks if the value is a safe integer.

returns.description: - Whether the value is a safe integer.

isString.name: isString
isString.description: Checks if the value is a string.

returns.description: - Whether the value is a string.

lt.name: lt
lt.description: Check if a value is less than the provided value.

returns.description: - Returns true if the value is less than the given value.

lte.name: lte
lte.description: Check if a value is less than or equal to the provided value.

returns.description: - Returns true if the value is less than or equal to the given value.

toArray.name: toArray
toArray.description: Convert a value to an array.

returns.description: - Returns the converted array.

toFinite.name: toFinite
toFinite.description: Convert a value to a finite number.

returns.description: - Returns the finite number.

toInteger.name: toInteger
toInteger.description: Convert a value to an integer.

returns.description: - Returns the converted integer.

toLength.name: toLength
toLength.description: Convert a value to a length.

returns.description: - Returns the converted length.

toNumber.name: toNumber
toNumber.description: Convert a value to a number.

returns.description: - Returns the converted number.

toString.name: toString
toString.description: Convert a value to a string.

returns.description: - Returns the converted string.

params.name: path
params.description: - The jsonpath expression to query the data.

returns.description: - The result of the query.

add.name: add
add.description: Add multiple numbers and return the sum.

returns.description: - The sum of the numbers.

abs.name: abs
abs.description: Return the absolute value of a number.

returns.description: - The absolute value of the number.

subtract.name: subtract
subtract.description: Subtract multiple numbers and return the result.

params.name: x
params.description: - The first number to be subtracted.

params.name: y
params.description: - The second number to be subtracted.

returns.description: - The result of the subtraction.

multiply.name: multiply
multiply.description: Multiply multiple numbers and return the product.

returns.description: - The product of the numbers.

divide.name: divide
divide.description: Divide multiple numbers and return the result.

returns.description: - The result of the division.

mod.name: mod
mod.description: Get the remainder of a division.

returns.description: - The remainder.

pow.name: pow
pow.description: Calculate the power of a number raised to the specified exponent.

returns.description: - The result of raising the base to the power of the exponents.

sqrt.name: sqrt
sqrt.description: Calculate the square root of a number.

params.name: value
params.description: - The number to find the square root of.

returns.description: - The square root of the number.

round.name: round
round.description: Round a number to a specified number of decimal places.

params.name: precision
params.description: - The number of decimal places to round to.

returns.description: - The rounded number.

ceil.name: ceil
ceil.description: Round a number upward to the nearest integer.

params.name: value
params.description: - The number to be rounded up.

returns.description: - The rounded number.

floor.name: floor
floor.description: Round a number downward to the nearest integer.

params.name: value
params.description: - The number to be rounded down.

returns.description: - The rounded number.

sum.name: sum
sum.description: Sum all the elements in an array.

params.name: values
params.description: - The array of numbers to sum.

returns.description: - The sum of the array elements.

mean.name: mean
mean.description: Calculate the mean (average) of an array of numbers.

params.name: values
params.description: - The array of numbers to calculate the mean of.

returns.description: - The mean of the array elements.

median.name: median
median.description: Calculate the median of an array of numbers.

params.name: values
params.description: - The array of numbers to calculate the median of.

returns.description: - The median of the array elements.

min.name: min
min.description: Get the minimum value from an array.

returns.description: - The minimum value in the array.

max.name: max
max.description: Get the maximum value from an array.

returns.description: - The maximum value in the array.

std.name: std
std.description: Get the standard deviation of an array.

returns.description: - The standard deviation of the array.

variance.name: variance
variance.description: Get the variance of an array.

returns.description: - The variance of the array.

random.name: random
random.description: Generate a random number between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive).

returns.description: - A random number between `min` and `max` (if provided), or between 0 and 1.

randomInt.name: randomInt
randomInt.description: Generate a random integer between a given range.

returns.description: - A random integer between `min` and `max`.

gcd.name: gcd
gcd.description: Calculate the greatest common divisor (GCD) of given numbers.

params.name: values
params.description: - The numbers to calculate the GCD for.

returns.description: - The GCD of the numbers.

lcm.name: lcm
lcm.description: Calculate the least common multiple (LCM) of given numbers.

returns.description: - The LCM of the numbers.

prime.name: prime
prime.description: Check if a number is prime.

returns.description: - True if the number is prime, false otherwise.

formatNumber.name: formatNumber
formatNumber.description: Format a number according to a specified format.

returns.description: - The formatted number.

formatCurrency.name: formatCurrency
formatCurrency.description: Format a number into a currency format.

returns.description: - The formatted currency.

formatPercentage.name: formatPercentage
formatPercentage.description: Format a number into a percentage format.

params.name: value
params.description: - The number to be formatted (as a decimal).

returns.description: - The formatted percentage.

formatThousand.name: formatThousand
formatThousand.description: Format a number into a thousand separator format.

returns.description: - The formatted number with thousand separators.

formatCustomCurrency.name: formatCustomCurrency
formatCustomCurrency.description: Format a number into a custom currency format with a specified number of decimals.

params.name: decimals
params.description: - The number of decimal places (default is 2).

returns.description: - The formatted currency.

formatAuto.name: formatAuto
formatAuto.description: Automatically format a number as either an integer or with two decimal places.

returns.description: - The formatted number.

findKey.name: findKey
findKey.description: Find the first key in an object that satisfies the predicate function.

params.name: predicate
params.description: - The function to test each value.

returns.description: - The key of the first element that satisfies the predicate.

findLastKey.name: findLastKey
findLastKey.description: Find the last key in an object that satisfies the predicate function, starting from the end.

params.name: predicate
params.description: - The function to test each value.

returns.description: - The key of the last element that satisfies the predicate.

get.name: get
get.description: Safely get the value at a given path in an object.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to retrieve the value from.

params.name: defaultValue
params.description: - The default value to return if the path doesn't exist.

returns.description: - The value at the given path or the default value.

has.name: has
has.description: Check if a given path exists as a direct property in an object.

returns.description: - True if the path exists as a direct property, otherwise false.

invert.name: invert
invert.description: Invert the keys and values of an object. If values are duplicated, later values overwrite earlier ones.

returns.description: - The object with inverted keys and values.

invertBy.name: invertBy
invertBy.description: Invert the keys and values of an object using an iteratee function to determine the new values.

params.name: iteratee
params.description: - The function to generate the inverted values.

returns.description: - The object with inverted keys and values.

invoke.name: invoke
invoke.description: Invoke a method at a given path in an object with arguments.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object containing the method to invoke.

params.name: args
params.description: - The arguments to pass to the method.

returns.description: - The result of invoking the method.

keys.name: keys
keys.description: Get the keys of an object.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to get the keys from.

returns.description: - The keys of the object.

mapValues.name: mapValues
mapValues.description: Create a new object with the same keys as the original object, but with values generated by an iteratee function.

params.name: iteratee
params.description: - The function to transform each value.

returns.description: - The new object with transformed values.

params.name: sources
params.description: - The objects to merge into the base object.

returns.description: - The merged object.

omit.name: omit
omit.description: Create a new object excluding the specified properties.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to omit properties from.

returns.description: - The new object with the omitted properties.

omitBy.name: omitBy
omitBy.description: Create a new object excluding properties based on a predicate function.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to omit properties from.

params.name: predicate
params.description: - The function to test each property.

returns.description: - The new object with the omitted properties.

pick.name: pick
pick.description: Create a new object with only the specified properties.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to pick properties from.

returns.description: - The new object with only the picked properties.

pickBy.name: pickBy
pickBy.description: Create a new object with properties that satisfy a predicate function.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to pick properties from.

params.name: predicate
params.description: - The function to test each property.

returns.description: - The new object with only the properties that pass the predicate.

values.name: values
values.description: Get the values of an object's properties.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to get the values from.

returns.description: - The values of the object's properties.

set.name: set
set.description: Safely set the value at a given path in an object.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to set the value in.

params.name: value
params.description: - The object to set the value in.

returns.description: - The updated object.

unset.name: unset
unset.description: Remove a property at a given path in an object.

params.name: object
params.description: - The object to remove the property from.

params.name: path
params.description: - The path to the property to remove.

returns.description: - True if the property was removed, otherwise false.

camelCase.name: camelCase
camelCase.description: Convert a string to camel case.

returns.description: - The camel-cased string.

capitalize.name: capitalize
capitalize.description: Capitalize the first letter of a string.

returns.description: - The string with the first letter capitalized.

endsWith.name: endsWith
endsWith.description: Check if a string ends with the given target.

params.name: position
params.description: - The position to check up to.

returns.description: - Returns true if the string ends with the target.

kebabCase.name: kebabCase
kebabCase.description: Convert a string to kebab case (lowercase with hyphens).

returns.description: - The kebab-cased string.

lowerCase.name: lowerCase
lowerCase.description: Convert a string to lowercase and remove spaces between words.

returns.description: - The lowercase string.

lowerFirst.name: lowerFirst
lowerFirst.description: Convert the first letter of a string to lowercase.

returns.description: - The string with the first letter in lowercase.

pad.name: pad
pad.description: Pad a string to a specified length with spaces or other characters.

params.name: length
params.description: - The target length of the string.

params.name: chars
params.description: - The characters used to pad the string.

returns.description: - The padded string.

padEnd.name: padEnd
padEnd.description: Pad a string to a specified length, with padding at the end of the string.

params.name: length
params.description: - The target length of the string.

params.name: chars
params.description: - The characters used to pad the string.

returns.description: - The padded string.

padStart.name: padStart
padStart.description: Pad a string to a specified length, with padding at the start of the string.

params.name: length
params.description: - The target length of the string.

params.name: chars
params.description: - The characters used to pad the string.

returns.description: - The padded string.

parseInt.name: parseInt
parseInt.description: Parse a string and return an integer of the specified radix (base).

returns.description: - The parsed integer.
- The repeated string.

replace.name: replace
replace.description: Replace a substring within a string with a new substring.

returns.description: - The modified string.

snakeCase.name: snakeCase
snakeCase.description: Convert a string to snake case (lowercase with underscores).

returns.description: - The snake-cased string.

split.name: split
split.description: Split a string into an array using a specified separator.

returns.description: - The array of split strings.

startCase.name: startCase
startCase.description: Convert a string to start case (capitalize the first letter of each word).

returns.description: - The start-cased string.

startsWith.name: startsWith
startsWith.description: Check if a string starts with a given target.

returns.description: - Returns true if the string starts with the target.
- The string in lowercase.
- The string in uppercase.

trim.name: trim
trim.description: Trim whitespace from both ends of a string.

returns.description: - The trimmed string.

trimEnd.name: trimEnd
trimEnd.description: Trim whitespace from the end of a string.

returns.description: - The trimmed string.

trimStart.name: trimStart
trimStart.description: Trim whitespace from the start of a string.

returns.description: - The trimmed string.

truncate.name: truncate
truncate.description: Truncate a string if it exceeds the specified length, appending an ellipsis.

params.name: options
params.type: { length: number; omission?: string; separator?: string; }

returns.description: - The truncated string.

upperCase.name: upperCase
upperCase.description: Convert a string to uppercase and remove spaces between words.

returns.description: - The uppercase string without spaces.

upperFirst.name: upperFirst
upperFirst.description: Convert the first character of a string to uppercase.

returns.description: - The string with the first character in uppercase.

words.name: words
words.description: Split a string into an array of words.

params.name: pattern
params.description: - The pattern used to split the string.

returns.description: - An array of words.
